revised_title: Botanical Epidemiology: Genetics, Models, and Disease Dynamics
tldr: This article discusses the unique aspects of botanical epidemiology, focusing on the relationship between plant genetics and pathogen-host interactions. It explores the use of mathematical models and equations to understand disease dynamics and the role of resistance mechanisms in plant disease management. The author highlights the importance of understanding these concepts to improve crop protection and prevent devastating epidemics.
